stringlist.string: Do not show this message again
Scalix Web Access requires JavaScript to be enabled.
Login successful. You may close this window,%BRor click %A1here%A2 if you want to return to the login window.
Your browser or version is not supported.%BR Firefox 3 and above, Internet Explorer 7,8,9,10, Google Chrome 26 and above, and Safari 4 and 5 are supported.
The evaluation period for this time-limited product has expired. Please contact support@scalix.com to upgrade.
Your account has not been enabled for use with Scalix Web Access. Please contact your system administrator.
Your account has been locked. Please contact your system administrator.
Your browser or version is not officially supported, but may work anyway. Firefox 3 and above, Internet Explorer 7,8,9,10, Google Chrome 26 and above, and Safari 4 and 5 are supported.
There are no messages in this folder.
messages in this folder that pass this filter.
You have received a new message
Go to previous increment in view
Go to next increment in view
Please wait a moment. We cannot send the message until it is finished saving.
Please wait a moment. We cannot post the message until it is finished saving.
Under Receiving Mail, please set the automatic mail checking interval to %s minutes or greater.
A valid outgoing name is required
A valid address is required for the reply/to field
Automatically log in to this account from this computer
We do not recommend this option if you are visiting Scalix Web Access from a public computer (such as in a library or internet cafe).
Include original message text in reply
When sending mail, check names first in
Automatically check for new messages every
Initially retrieve the following time window
Block loading of remote images in mail messages
(only show the display name when a display name is provided)
Show %s day(s) in the upcoming appointments
Publish %s month(s) of Calendar Free/Busy information on the server
Update Free/Busy information on the server every %s minute(s)
Some of the changes you have made will be available the next time you log into Scalix Web Access.
Your work week selection is invalid
Your work day selection is invalid
The upcoming appointments period you have chosen is invalid
The number of months of Free/Busy information you have chosen is invalid [1-6]
The Free/Busy information update interval you have chosen is invalid [1-99]
Are you sure you want to reset all user-defined options with system default values? This cannot be undone.
Please select theme from the list.
Search Subject Field in This Folder
Search From Field in This Folder
Search To Field in This Folder
You must specify a valid date.
The File As for this contact is empty. You may not have entered a name or a company. Do you want to save this contact with an empty File As field?
A name must be specified to add a member to the list
A valid email address must be specified to add a member to the list
The Subject for this task is empty. You may not have entered this information. Do you want to save this task with an empty subject field?
An error occurred while trying to get the access control list of the "%FOLDER" folder.
An error occurred while trying to set the access control list on the "%FOLDER" folder.
One or more users could not be added to the folder access control list. One or more users are already specified.
You do not have sufficient permissions to view this folder access control list. Your permissions on this folder are:
You do not have sufficient permissions to view this folder access control list
You do not have sufficient permissions to alter this folder's properties
I am out of the office
Auto-reply once to each sender with the following text:
You have enabled Out of Office for this mailbox. Would you like to view or disable your Out of Office settings?
List these additional mailboxes in the folder tree (Note: Changes to this list will take effect the next time you log into Scalix Web Access)
Send meeting requests and responses only to my delegates, not to me
The selected delegate has the following permissions:
Delegate receives copy of meeting-related messages sent to me
Delegate can see my private items
One or more users could not be added because already specified.
An error occurred while trying to set the delegates on this mailbox. Please notify your system administrator about this problem.
An error occurred while trying to save this message.
An error occurred while trying to save this contact. Would you like to reopen the unsaved contact?
An error occurred while trying to save this distribution list. Would you like to reopen the unsaved distribution list?
An error occurred while trying to save this appointment. Would you like to reopen the unsaved appointment?
This operation is not permitted as long as the folder has not been fully loaded.

Scalix has determined that you have an existing "%folderName" mailbox in your IMAP account. Because this mailbox name matches the name of a reserved folder in the Scalix client, the data in your "%folderName" mailbox will be ignored during this session. To prevent this message from displaying, use another IMAP client to either delete or rename your "%folderName" mailbox. If you did not explicitly create the "%folderName" mailbox, contact your e-mail administrator to configure Scalix Web Access to prevent this message from displaying.
An error has occurred. Contact your e-mail administrator if the problem persists.
At least one required special folder is missing from your mailbox. The required special folders are Inbox, Sent Items and Deleted Items. Please notify your system administrator about this problem.
Scalix Web Access cannot determine the filename of the attachment and therefore cannot download the attachment. Contact your e-mail administrator for help.
You cannot delete or move messages from the Outbox. If you do not want to send the messages in the Outbox, log out of Scalix Web Access.

Downloading attachment. Click OK when finished. Your browser security settings may prevent the attachment from being downloaded successfully. You will need to setup your webmail server as a trusted site or change browser settings to allow file downloads from this location. If you need help on doing this, please consult with your network administrator.
Cannot complete the last operation because the connection to the server was terminated. Reconnect to the server and try the operation again.
Your Scalix server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
The message could not be loaded due to connection loss. Please try again later.
Filtered view of this folder is empty
You cannot reply to more than one message at a time. Select only one message and click Reply.
You cannot reply to/forward this type of message.
You cannot forward more than one message at a time. Select only one message and click Forward.
Moving a recurring appointment to a new calendar will move the entire series. Continue?

Your computer appears to be using an application that prevents web sites from opening windows. While these utilites (such as Pop-Up Stopper, Pop-Up Killer, and some Norton applications) are effective at blocking unwanted pop-up windows, they can prevent web-based applications like Scalix Web Access from operating correctly. You might need to modify setting in your pop-up window blocking application.
A modal dialog is open in the application main window. You must first dismiss that dialog before you can execute this action.
There are no messages in this view.
There are no contacts in this view.
You must specify a recipient for the message in the To:, Cc: or Bcc: field.
There are too many addresses in the From box.
You don't seem to have the necessary permissions to send a message on behalf of this person. Please contact this person or your e-mail administrator in order to be granted delegate access.
This is not a valid e-mail address: %s.
Cannot find a match for the e-mail address: %s.
There is more than one contact that matches: %s Enter the e-mail address for this contact.

This is an automatically generated message to notify you about a message that has been read. Your message
To: %name Subject: %subject Sent: %sent
was read at %time on %date.
The sender of this message has asked to be notified when you read this message. Do you wish to notify the sender?
The recipient list expanded to an empty list
Due to a failure to establish a connection, the message could not be sent. Please try again later. A copy of the message has been placed into your 'Drafts' folder.
To help protect your privacy, Scalix Web Access has blocked remote images in this message.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete the contents of the Deleted Items folder and its subfolders?
Are you sure you want to permanently delete the contents of this folder, and its subfolders?
Are you sure you want to permanently delete the selected message(s)?
You can only delete folders that you created. You cannot delete system folders.
Double click here to add an appointment with no specific time, such as a vacation day.
Changing the format of this message from Rich Text to Plain Text will remove all the current formatting. Are you sure you wish to continue?
Append the following text to all outgoing messages:
Are you sure you want to delete this folder and its contents?
Your web-browser has denied access to creating the main application window. Close all browser windows and log in again.

The main application window was closed during the creation of this message. Scalix Web Access is therefore unable to send the message. If you want to save the contents of this message, select the text in the message and copy the text to another application. To send the contents of this message, close all browser windows, log into your account, click New Message, and paste the copied text into the message body.
Scalix Web Access determined that you do not have cookies enabled in your browser. Scalix Web Access requires cookies to operate. Enable cookies and try again.
The user name field cannot be empty
The server failed to send back valid XML. Contact your e-mail administrator and report this message.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected items?
Are you sure you want to delete the selected contact?
Are you sure you want to delete the selected distribution list?
You cannot delete a message from a public folder.
You cannot delete a Contact or Distribution List from a public folder.
This contact or distribution list no longer exists.
The selected format for filing this contact is %format but the following fields are empty [%missing]
You cannot post to the selected folder

An error occurred while trying to Post a message to this folder. This may be due to not having valid folder permissions. Please contact your e-mail administrator to determine whether you have the correct permissions to access this folder.
Scalix Web Access is processing the attachments. Do not edit the attachments or send the message until Scalix Web Access finishes processing the attachments.
Scalix Web Access could not process attachments. Continuing forwarding/replying without attachments, or close the window to restart the operation.
The URL you entered for your new mail notification sound is invalid. Go to File > Preferences and enter a different URL.
you must be logged in to activate autologin.
There was a problem connecting to the mail server. Please try again later.
Unable to connect to IMAP server
Missing expected IMAP server extension ID property
could not create account for user: %name
Trying to resolve the addresses. Try again in a moment.
The username or password is incorrect. Note that passwords are case sensitive. Try again.
An error occurred on the server. Close your browser windows and log into Scalix Web Access again. Underlying cause: The timestamp provided is invalid in this context.

Your session has expired. This likely occurred because you or another user logged into this account from another system while the session window was open. Scalix Web Access does not support more than one open session. Click the OK button below and exit this Scalix Web Access session. Then, log into Scalix Web Access again.
An error occurred on the server. Collect the following information and contact your e-mail administrator.
Authorization failure: You are not authorized to view this content.

Cannot log you in at this time. This is a limited evaluation copy of Scalix Web Access. The maximum number of evaluation accounts has been reached for this system. Contact Scalix if you want to obtain a license for more accounts. The current maximum number of accounts is:
A message could not be sent, please try again later. A copy of the message has been placed into your 'Drafts' folder.

Your browser has sent a malformed request. This is most likely caused by a problem in the Norton Internet Security or Norton Personal Firewall application. If you are using one of these applications, disable Privacy Control and log into Scalix Web Access again. If this does not resolve the problem, contact your e-mail administrator.

ERROR:
Scalix Web Access could not correctly parse this message because it is not a valid MIME e-mail message.

Contact the sender and have them fix their mail application (which is sending out the invalid MIME message.)
Mime Error:
ERROR: *** Scalix could not completely parse this message because it is invalid MIME ***
*** SCALIX IS UNABLE TO PARSE THE MESSAGE PART

---------- MESSAGE CANNOT BE FOUND ----------
. . . . . . . . Close Scalix Web Access
This message cannot be found under the unique ID.
The message is no longer on the server. This can occur if you delete a message using another mail client. To resolve this problem, log out of Scalix Web Access and log in again.
The original message has been deleted from the server and cannot be operated on.
This message is already opened in another window.
Include an updated copy of this task in my task list:
Send me a status report when this task is complete:
Click here to add a name
This user does not have an email address or his email address is invalid.
The start time you entered is not a recognized time value. Please enter a value such as 18:00 or 6:00 PM.
The end time you entered is not a recognized time value. Please enter a value such as 18:00 or 6:00 PM.
The reminder time you entered is not a recognized time value. Please enter a value such as 18:00 or 6:00 PM.
Percentage completed you entered is not a valid value. Please enter value 0-100.
You must specify a valid start date.
You must specify a valid end date.
The "End by" date you entered is not a recognized date value.
You must specify a valid reminder date.
You must specify a valid due date.
The end date you entered occurs before the start date.
Please specify a valid value for the 'Interval' field.
Please specify a valid day on which this appointment occurs.
Please specify a valid value for the 'End after' field.
Please select at least one day of the week on which this appointment occurs.
The "End By" date you selected occurs before the start date of the recurrence pattern.
Responses to this meeting request will not be tallied because this meeting is in a public calendar
Some months have fewer than %s days. For these months, the occurrence will fall on the last day of the month.
February sometimes has fewer than 29 days. On those years, the occurrence will fall on the last day of February.
Any exceptions associated with this recurring appointment will be lost. If any of the exceptions are meetings, the attendees will not be notified. Do you wish to continue?
The reminder for this appointment will not appear because the item is in a public calendar.
The reminder for an occurrence of this recurring appointment cannot be set to appear before the previous occurrence. Shorten the reminder time or lengthen the recurrence period.
The reminder for an occurrence of this recurring task cannot be set to appear before the previous occurrence. Shorten the reminder time or lengthen the recurrence period.
This item cannot be printed because it has not been saved yet
Are you sure you want to dismiss all these reminders?
Click Snooze to be reminded again in:
This operation cannot be executed right now because the appointment you are trying to modify is in the process of being saved. Please try again in a few moments.
This appointment is private and cannot be viewed.
A reminder is set for this appointment
This appointment is marked as private
Two occurrences of a recurring appointment cannot occur on the same day
This appointment does not exist anymore. It was probably deleted from another client.
Could not save calendar sets because they were never loaded.
You must enter a name for the calendar set.
Are you sure you want to delete this calendar set?
This is a repeating appointment. Do you want to change only this occurrence or the whole series?
Do you want to delete all occurrences of the recurring appointment or just this one?
Are you sure you want to cancel the meeting, notify the attendees of the cancellation and release all resources associated with the meeting?
This meeting has been declined and will be permanently deleted. Do you want to send a response to the organizer?
Would you like to send an update to the attendees regarding the changes you made to this meeting?
This meeting has been updated and will be moved to your calendar. Do you want to send a response to the organizer?
The %EVERY %DAY of every %INTERVAL month(s) from %START_TIME to %END_TIME %TIME_ZONE
Day %DAY of every %INTERVAL month(s) from %START_TIME to %END_TIME %TIME_ZONE
Could not retrieve Free/Busy information for this attendee
You do not have permission to access Free/Busy information. Please contact your system administrator.
Rules Wizard not installed. Please contact your administrator.
A reminder is set for this task
You have more than one address for the name %s. Please select which address you would like to use.
An error occurred resolving the addressees of this email. Please contact your system administrator.
A search pattern must be specified to perform this operation.
1. Click Browse to select the file you want to attach.
3. Repeat steps 1 and 2 to add more attachments. To remove an attachment, select it below and click Remove.
Please select the file you would like to upload by clicking on the browse button.
Partial list. Please narrow down your search.
A member must be selected to delete it
Please enter a name for this distribution list.
A name must be specified to add a member to the list
An email address must be specified to add a member to the list
There was a problem with the spell checker. Please Try again.
There is no dictionary available for your selected language (%s). Spell check cannot be performed.

There is no dictionary available for your selected language (%s). No automatic spell check can be performed.
Send message anyway?
Do you want to stop spelling checking and send this email?
Do you want to save the changes to your 'Drafts' folder?

Do you want to save this message as a draft?
Press 'OK' to save a draft. Press 'Cancel' to discard the message.
An error occurred while trying to upload this file.\nPlease check that the file exists on your computer and try again.
Please select the file you would like to upload by clicking on the browse button.
1. Click Browse to select the file you want to attach.
3. Repeat steps 1 and 2 to add more attachments. To remove an attachment, select it below and click Remove.
The list of previous recipients is still being loaded. Try again in a moment.
Are you sure you want to remove all entries from the auto-complete list of previous recipients?
The list of previous recipients is now empty
SWA could not determine the email address for this account. The default email address 'invalid@email.com' will be used. Please contact your system administrator to remedy this situation.
The email address %addr is not valid
The email address seems incorrect (check @ and .'s)
The username portion of the address contains invalid characters.
The username portion of this address is not valid
The domain portion of the address contains invalid characters.
The domain portion of this address is not valid
The domain seems to be an invalid IP address
The domain portion is not well known (e.g. .com, .edu) or a two letter country
This address is missing a hostname
You can only have one active SWA session at any time. To log in with a different user quit your existing SWA session first.
This search exceeded the time limit allowed. A partial results list is being returned.
%type occurred during the search operation. Please notify your system administrator about this problem.
The new passwords entered did not match. Please enter them again.
Your password has been updated successfully
An error occurred while changing your password. Please contact your system administrator.
The password you typed does not match your old password.
Your new password does not match the requirements established by your system administrator. Please contact your system administrator.

As the meeting organizer, you do not need to respond to the meeting.

This meeting involves delegation. Delegation is supported by Scalix Web Access but is not supported by the version of the Scalix server you are currently running. Please use Outlook to proceed with this meeting.
You were in the middle of composing a message. You will lose your changes if you press OK.
Please select text to add link
A calendar set with this name already exists. Overwrite?
Select where to place the folder:
The resources have been successfully processed
"%s" is already booked for the specified time. You must use another time or find another resource.
An error occurred while trying to process the resources. Please contact your system administrator.
An error occurred while trying to process the resource "%s". Please contact your system administrator.
The resource "%s" has not been configured to automatically accept meeting requests or process cancellations. Please contact your system administrator.
The resource "%s" has been configured to automatically reject recurring meeting requests.
This message will be processed as soon as the calendar has been fully loaded.
This message could not be processed properly because the calendar could not be loaded.
This message was sent with High Importance.
This message was sent with Low Importance.
This message has been marked as %sensitivity and cannot be viewed in the preview pane.
This message has been marked as %sensitivity and is being blocked from the preview pane.
This message has been marked as %sensitivity and cannot be viewed.
This message has been marked as %sensitivity and is being blocked.
This message has been marked as %sensitivity. Do you wish to read the message?
An error occurred while fetching the messages in your calendar folder(s)
The following users' folders could not be accessed: %s. The folders may not exist, or you may not have permission to access them.
An error occurred while fetching the full headers of this message
An error occurred while fetching the raw message. Please attempt to reload the message by clicking Send/Receive
Failed to display messages for folder %s. The browser received some data, but it was unable to display it. Click 'Send/Receive' to try again.
An error occurred while retrieving the current Out Of Office settings
An error occurred while retrieving the list of additional mailboxes
An error occurred while fetching the content of this message
An error occured while retrieving the metadata for folder %s
Your request to the server has timed out. Keep trying?
An error occurred while trying to create folder [%name]
A folder with that name already exists. Enter a different name for the folder.
A folder with that name already exists in Deleted Items. Please empty your Deleted Items folder before continuing with this operation.
A folder name cannot be empty. Enter a name for the folder
The folder name contains invalid characters
The selected folder is already at the top of the hierarchy
This operation is not allowed on a special folder
This operation is not allowed on a virtual folder
This operation is not allowed on this folder
You do not have the necessary permissions to perform this operation
An error occurred while trying to get the permissions on this folder
You cannot create a subfolder beneath this folder.
This folder cannot be moved to that location
